title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 318: Featuring Charlie McAvoy + Colin Wilson
description:
On Episode 318 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Charlie McAvoy and Colin Wilson. Charlie joined (41:55) to tell some funny stories about the Bruins, to talk about the loss of Torey Krug and Zdeno Chara, some iguana wrestling stories and more. The guys also talk about all the big NHL news, including Tony DeAngelo getting put on Waivers and Jim Rutherford leaving the Penguins. Colin then joined (1:59:24) to talk about his recent retirement, his OCD, post career and a bunch more. The guys wrap up with some final NHL news, some golf talk and a funny KHL story.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
